访客模式是秤体提供的一个公共通道的测量方式，该方式无需注册用户直接使用，访客模式使用的是临时用户，该用户的存在时间为从连接到断开，当设备断开连接时临时用户即销毁，同时在访客模式下不会产生与接收存储数据
该设备的涉及的方面比较多，并且协议之间的通讯过程以及使能方式都要严格的要求，我司目前已经将其封装成
该设备避免了用户在测量过程中需要使用蓝牙连接设备才能进行详细测量的步骤，提升用户体验。只要使设备连接网络，并向设备注册一次需要测量的用户信息，后续该用户便可脱离
连接之前，需要先设置连接状态回调和测量数据回调。

需要将设备返回该用户的序列号与秘钥保存起来。当通过蓝牙连接更新用户资料或用户通过蓝牙连接测量时，需要先使用用户序列号与秘钥访问秤端的指定用户成功后才能进行。同时序列号也是作为设备上传测量数据属于哪个注册用户的标识，以及作为删除用户的必要条件。

广播厨房秤是一款无需连接，通过接收设备发出的广播获取相关数据的设备。该秤与普通蓝牙秤不同，区别在于普通蓝牙秤在扫描到周围的设备信息时，可以发起对周围某一设备的连接，从而可以选择是否停止扫描周围的设备信息，而不影响从已连接设备中获取相关的测量信息。
当前秤体显示的重量数值,默认单位为g
当前秤是否去皮,true为去皮
当前秤是否是负重量,true为负重量
当前秤是否超载,true为超载
然而广播厨房秤由于是通过获取周围设备的广播数据进而分析相关的测量信息，无需对某一设备进行连接。因此倘若在使用广播秤进行测量过程中，停止了对周围设备的扫描，意味着无法获取这次的测量数据。

guide/ios.html.title: ios
guide/ios.html.body:
iOS Quick Integration
The operation of the SDK requires appid and configuration files. When the merchant accesses, the test appid and test configuration file provided by the runcobo can be used first. When the official release, the official appid and configuration file must be obtained from the official.
Installation method
cocoapods installation:

Install Cocoapods first;
Update the cocoapods version of QNSDK via pod repo update;
Add pod 'QNSDK' to the target corresponding to the Podfile and execute pod install;
Run the project in the project using the .xcworkspace generated by CocoaPods;
Introduce the header file `#import  in your code file header.

Carthage installation:

Install Carthage;
Open Cartfile and add github "https://github.com/YolandaQingniu/sdk-ios-demo.git";
Open the command line, cd to your project directory, enter carthage update;
Drag QNSDK.framework from the Carthage/Build/ directory to Build Phases -> Linked Binary and Libraries in your project configuration.
Introduce the header file `#import  in your code file header.

Manual installation:

Download the SDK installation package to the project
Introducing SDK path [TARGETS]-> [Build Setting]->[Search Paths]->[LibrarySearch Paths]Add SDK path
Configure the linker [TARGETS]-> [Build Setting]-> [Linking]-> [Other Linker Flags] add one of -ObjC, -all_load, -force_load [SDK path]

Project configuration

There is a pair in the Info.plist [Privacy - Bluetooth Peripheral Usage Description] [Privacy - Bluetooth Always Usage Description] button.

Precautions

SDK adaptation 8.0 and above
iOS10.0 and above must have Bluetooth instructions in Info.plist, otherwise the system's Bluetooth function cannot be used.
iOS13.0 and above must be configured with the authorization instructions for Bluetooth in Info.plist, otherwise it will be found to crash.
The linker must be configured for the SDK or the SDK will not function properly

flow/ble_scale.html.title: Ordinary Bluetooth Scale

flow/ble_scale_custom_connect.html.title: Ordinary Bluetooth Scale - Manage Bluetooth Autonomously
flow/ble_scale_custom_connect.html.body:
Ordinary Bluetooth scale-Autonomous management of Bluetooth
This chapter is for users who have a certain understanding of Bluetooth and have their own Bluetooth framework in the app.

If you are not familiar with Bluetooth, or do not have your own Bluetooth framework, it is not recommended to use this method to access, otherwise it will increase the cost of access

 
First, start Bluetooth scanning
The customer initiates and stops the Bluetooth scan, and transmits the scanned device information to our SDK (call QNBleApi.buildDevice). If it belongs to our device, the SDK will Will build QNBleDevice, if it is not our device, it will return null/nil.

Usually the Bluetooth of our device is called QN-Scale or QN-Scale1, and we can usually filter our products by this Bluetooth name.
After getting the target device, it is up to the APP to decide whether to stop scanning. We usually recommend stopping the Bluetooth scan before connecting.

II. Create a Bluetooth protocol proxy class
Create your own Bluetooth protocol proxy class QNBleProtocolDelegate and implement all its methods. The specific implementation can be our Demo
III. Create a Bluetooth protocol processing class
Create protocol processing class QNBleProtocolHandler using QNBleApi.buildProtocolHandler
IV. Connect yourself to Bluetooth
Connect devices using the system API or your own Bluetooth framework.
The logic of this part is handled by the APP itself.
五, Discover service, enable feature value
Our scale uses two sets of services, one device will only contain one set. The APP needs to traverse all the services to find one of the service IDs. If a set is found, the feature values ​​that need to be called back are enabled according to the feature values ​​in the table below.
After enabling the eigenvalue, call prepare of QNBleProtocolHandler and pass the UUID of the service used.
The first set
The service ID is: FFE0
Use some eigenvalues ​​below it, as follows:



UUID
Attribute
Description




FFE1
Notify
Main data callback feature value


FFE3
Write
The main data is written to the feature value


FFE2
Indicate
Secondary data callback feature values, note that this property is Indicate, Android's enablement may be a bit different


FFE4
Write
Secondary data callback eigenvalue


2A19
Read
Charge scale power characteristic value




The UUID of the feature value is only provided in the form of 32 bits. If Android needs to use 128 bits, it will be stitched by itself.
For example, the 128 bits of FFE0 are: 0000ffe0-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb

The second set
The service ID is: FFF0
There are only two feature values ​​below it, one for data callbacks and one for data writes.



UUID
Attribute
Description




FFF1
Notify
Data callback feature value


FFF2
Write
Data write feature value


2A19
Read
Charge scale power characteristic value



Data interaction
Once the eigenvalue is enabled, you can receive the data uploaded by the scale.
After the APP receives the callback data of the scale end, it sends it to the SDK for parsing by the method QNBleProtocolHandler.onGetBleData, and the parsed data will pass QNScaleDataListener callback.
In addition, if you need to write data, the APP will be written by QNBleProtocolDelegate.writeCharacteristicValue.
Measurement completed
After the measurement is completed, the complete data will be recalled by QNScaleDataListener, after which the scale will actively disconnect.
The next time you connect, you need to recreate QNBleProtocolDelegate and QNBleProtocolHandler

双模秤接入引导

首次使用
首次使用时
1. 扫描设备
调用普通蓝牙秤的 API，扫描到轻牛蓝牙设备（QNBleDevice）,并判断 isSupportWifi 的值是否为 true，如果 true 则支持 Wifi 功能。
2. 注册设备

该方法需要网络，请确保该方法执行成功，否则云端无法收到我司云端转发的测量数据
该方法成功执行一次即可，不过多次无不良影响

3. 配置 WiFi
出厂时秤端未保存 WiFi 的 ssid 和密码，此时需要调用蓝牙的相关 APP 给秤端进行配网

4. 编写网络接口

下面统称我们公司服务器为:轻牛云，客户的服务器为：商家云

此时商家云需要在服务中查询绑定了该设备的用户，并把用户资料回传给轻牛云，然后轻牛结合用户资料进行计算再把数据通过推送测量数据服务。

推送测量数据服务
场景
轻牛云在收到商家云回传的用户资料后，会计算体质数据，然后通过该接口，把数据推送至商家云

通知交互时，如果轻牛收到合作方的应答不是成功或超时，轻牛认为通知失败，轻牛会通过一定的策略定期重新发起通知，尽可能提高通知的成功率，但轻牛不保证通知最终能成功。 （通知频率为 15/30/180/1800/3600，单位：秒）
另外，一般情况下应答成功后不会再次发送，失败情况下同样的通知可能会多次发送给合作方系统。合作方系统必须能够正确处理重复的通知。

}
返回参数
返回 success/fail 即可
签名算法
轻牛和合作方系统之间的数据交互都会加上数字签名,目前只支持 MD5 方式,签名时需要使用入驻轻牛时分配的 secret(入驻轻牛时会分配一对 partner_id /secret, 其中
secret 是用来签名的，请妥善保管好轻牛分配的密钥)
参与签名的参数：轻牛请求参数列表中,除去 sign 参数外,其他需要使用到的参数皆是要签名的参数。
签名生成的步骤如下：

把 这些参数放入一个 Map 中,去除签名参数:sign(签名)
把 剩余的参数按照 key 的字母升序排序(从 a 到 z 的顺序排序,若遇到相同首字母,则看第二个字母,以此类推)
排序完成之后,按 key&value 键值对格式连接成一个字符串 stringA,去掉 value 为空的数据。
把上面的字符串在后面拼接上分配的 secret 组成新的字符串
使用 MD5 对组装好的字符串签名,验证签名是否为参数中的 sign。

特别注意以下重要规则：

如果参数的值为空不参与签名；
验证调用返回或主动通知签名时，传送的 sign 参数不参与签名，将生成的签名与该 sign 值作校验。
轻牛接口可能增加字段，验证签名时必须支持增加的扩展字段

示例：
请求的参数：
{
  "partner_id": "1111",
  "user_code": "921026",
  "nonce_str": "11eeewwwwwq112s",
  "sign": "a328c2ec0a60cbbc9961a1189f61e97b"
}

拼接：
stringA = “nonce_str=11eeewwwwwq112s&partner_id=1111&user_code=921026”
拼接上 secret ：ekskdsd8sd88s833 后 "nonce_str=11eeewwwwwq112s&partner_id=1111&user_code=921026ekskd sd8sd88s833"
MD5 签名值：
a328c2ec0a60cbbc9961a1189f61e97b
日常使用时
WIFI 数据交互时序示意图
正常测量时流程
如下：


1、用户上秤测量后，数据会先发送至轻牛云
2、轻牛云根据注册设备方法判断该设备是属于客户的，然后将数据转发至客户已经填写好的云端地址。
3、客户云根据设备和用户之前的关系，尝试判断该条设备的所属人，如果判断出来，就把该用户的资料回传给轻牛云.
4、轻牛云收到客户云回传的用户资料，再结合秤端数据，计算出完整的测量数据。
5、轻牛云将完整测量数据推送至客户云。
6、客户云将测量数据推送至 APP，展示测量数据给客户看。
匹配到多用户测量
其中上述步骤中，第3步，可能会查找测量用户失败，出现如下情况：
1、没有用户绑定该设备
这种情况，可以直接将测量数据丢弃，发挥七牛云，未匹配到数据。
2、有多个用户同时绑定了该设备，或者说有多个用户同时在使用该设备。无法判断出是哪个用户在使用秤，则可以参考下图，我们自己 APP 中采用的用户识别方案。

3、如果通过上图方案，能够唯一确定一个用户，则按照正常测量流程处理。如果还是识别出多个用户，则可参照下面流程。



上图提到的调用SDK生成完整测量数据方法是：QNScaleStoreData.buildStoreData
询问用户资料接口中的签名(sign)也需要保存和下发至 APP，用来调用 SDK 生产测量数据。

flow/broadcast_scale_custom_scan.html.title: Broadcast Scale - Custom Bluetooth Scan
flow/broadcast_scale_custom_scan.html.body:
Broadcast scale-Custom Bluetooth Scan
This chapter is for users who have a certain understanding of Bluetooth and have their own Bluetooth framework in the app.
When the broadcast scale is measured, it will continuously emit Bluetooth broadcast signals, which will contain the information weighed by the user.
The instructions below are based on the fact that developers already have some knowledge of Bluetooth scanning. If you encounter a lot of problems, it is still recommended to use the SDK for scanning.
The workflow of this device is approximately as follows:

I. Initialization
Initialization using QNBleApi.initSdk, as described above, Please check
II, scanning
Call Bluetooth scan yourself
After calling the Bluetooth scan, pass the scanned broadcast information to the SDK via QNBleApi.buildBroadcastDevice
Results Processing
After getting QNBleBroadcastDevice, please refer to Broadcast Scale Access Procedure for the following processing.

flow/kitchen_scale_custom_scan.html.body:
厨房秤-自定义蓝牙扫描
该篇章是给对蓝牙有一定了解，并在APP中有自己蓝牙框架的用户使用 
厨房秤在测量时，会不断向外发射蓝牙广播信号，里面会包含称重的信息。
下文的说明是基于开发者已经对蓝牙扫描有了一定了解。如果遇到很多问题，还是建议使用SDK进行扫描的方式处理。
该设备的工作流程和广播秤流程一致：
一、初始化
使用QNBleApi.initSdk进行初始化，前文已有相关介绍，请查看
二、扫描
自行调用蓝牙扫描
调用蓝牙扫描后，把扫描到的广播信息传给SDK，通过QNBleApi.buildkitchenDevice
结果处理
拿到QNBleKitchenDevice后，接下面的处理请参考厨房秤接入流程

initSdk
Initialize the SDK based on appid and verify the appid and configuration file. This method also loads the relevant configuration in the configuration file.
This method can be called only once, not multiple times. It is recommended that Android be called in Application.onCreate, and iOS should be called in the method of didFinishLaunchingWithOptions under AppDelegate. This method only performs lightweight operations, and time-consuming operations are performed asynchronously without affecting the startup speed of the APP.
Normally, this method sends a request to our server to update the configuration in the configuration file, such as updating the algorithm, updating the metrics, adding new models, and so on. This can achieve the effect of online upgrade configuration. If you do not want this feature explicitly, you can turn off this feature with our business communication (ie, the SDK is changed to offline mode). In addition, if there is no network, the request will not affect, the SDK will continue to use the last configuration.

Note: The 123456789 appid in the demo is the test id, and the test id has instability and random variability. After the agreement between the access provider and the runcobo, an independent and stable appid can be obtained. Remember that the test Id is not available for the online application market.

api/QNBleBroadcastDevice.html.title: QNBleBroadcastDevice
api/QNBleBroadcastDevice.html.body:
QNBleBroadcastDevice
Light cattle broadcast scale Bluetooth device object
A broadcast scale is a device that acquires relevant data through a broadcast sent by a receiving device without connection. The scale is different from the ordinary Bluetooth scale. The difference is that the ordinary Bluetooth scale can initiate a connection to a surrounding device when scanning the surrounding device information, so that it can choose whether to stop scanning the surrounding device information without affecting the connected device. Get relevant measurement information.
However, since the broadcast scale analyzes related measurement information by acquiring broadcast data of surrounding devices, it is not necessary to connect a certain device. Therefore, if the scanning of the surrounding equipment is stopped during the measurement using the broadcast scale, it means that the measurement data of this time cannot be obtained.
Attributes



Name
Type
Description




mac
String
The MAC address, sdk will be parsed according to the scanned broadcast information. The same device, Android and IOS return the same result. Unique per device


name
String
Model name, the SDK will identify the scanned device model, if it is not recognized, return a default model name, Scale


modeId
String
Model Identification


bluetoothName
String
Bluetooth name, this is the hardware device broadcast name, different from name. APP is based on name.


RSSI
int
Signal strength, is a negative number, generally between -30~-100. The larger the value, the greater the signal strength. The same device may call back multiple times. The value of the signal strength may be used each time the callback is made. Different.


supportUnitChange
boolean
Whether to support the protocol mode to modify the scale unit


unit
int
The unit currently displayed by the scale body 0 is kg, the default value is />1 is lb 2 for jin


weight
double
The weight value displayed by the current scale body


isComplete
boolean
whether the measurement is complete


measureCode
int
The data is encoded after the measurement is completed. After the measurement is completed, multiple identical broadcast data may be received. Therefore, this field is used to distinguish whether multiple measurement completion data received in the adjacent time is the same measurement data.



method
generateScaleData
When the isComplete field is true, the method can be called to obtain related measurement data.
Obtain measurement data

Returns whether the method call succeeds



return value
Type: QNScaleData
Light cattle measurement data, including weight, BMI, body fat rate and other data.
syncUnit
When the supportUnitChange field of the device is true, it indicates that the device is allowed to be modified by means of a protocol. In this case, you can use this method to modify the unit.
When the method is successfully called, the SDK will send a Bluetooth broadcast signal. When the target device unit has been modified or 10s, the SDK will stop broadcasting.
After the method is called, the operation of the previous synchronization unit will be canceled, for example, the unit of the A device is being synchronized. When the unit of the B device is synchronized, the SDK will cancel the synchronization of the A device unit first, and then start the unit synchronization of the B device.
This unit is the unit set in QNConfig

api/QNBleKitchenDevice.html.title: QNBleKitchenDevice
api/QNBleKitchenDevice.html.body:
QNBleKitchenDevice
轻牛广播厨房秤蓝牙设备对象
广播厨房秤是一款无需连接，通过接收设备发出的广播获取相关数据的设备。该秤与普通蓝牙秤不同，区别在于普通蓝牙秤在扫描到周围的设备信息时，可以发起对周围某一设备的连接，从而可以选择是否停止扫描周围的设备信息，而不影响从已连接设备中获取相关的测量信息。
然而广播厨房秤由于是通过获取周围设备的广播数据进而分析相关的测量信息，无需对某一设备进行连接。因此倘若在使用广播秤进行测量过程中，停止了对周围设备的扫描，意味着无法获取这次的测量数据。
属性



名称
类型
说明




mac
String
MAC地址，sdk会根据扫描到的广播信息解析，同一台设备，安卓和IOS返回的结果一样。每台设备唯一


name
String
型号名称，SDK会识别扫描到的设备型号，如果识别不出来，则返回一个默认的型号名称，Scale


modeId
String
型号标识


RSSI
int
信号强度，一般 0~100 之间，数值越小，表示信号强度越大，同一个设备可能回调多次，每次回调时，可能信号强度的值不一样。


unit
int
秤体当前显示的单位 10 为 g，默认值 11 为 ml 12 为 oz13 为 lb:oz


weight
double
当前秤体显示的重量数值,默认单位为g


isPeel
boolean
当前秤是否去皮,true为去皮


isNegative
boolean
当前秤是否是负重量,true为负重量


isOverload
boolean
当前秤是否超载,true为超载

QNConfig
SDK configuration object, which controls the behavior of the scan, and sets some behaviors of the SDK through it.
Attributes

Type

onlyScreenOn
Boolean
Returns only the devices that are powered on (bright screen). The default is false, which returns the scale that is turned on and off.


allowDuplicates
Boolean
Whether the same device returns multiple times, in general, the device will always transmit Bluetooth broadcasts. When scanning, the system will call back the same device multiple times, and the SDK will process the same device to make a scan. A device only returns once, the merchant can set this parameter, and the SDK returns directly every time. Default false (this field is invalid for onBroadcastDeviceDiscover listener

int
Scan duration, in ms, defaults to 0, that is, scans all the time, unless the APP calls stopBleDeviceDiscovery. If it is not 0, the minimum value is 3000ms, the delay will automatically stop after the duration ms time. (If you have access to the broadcast scale, you need to pay attention to the setting of this field, see Broadcast Scale Working Principle)


connectOutTime
long
(Android exclusive) connection device limited time, the unit is ms, the default is 10000, that is, within 10 seconds after the connection is called, if the connection process cannot be completed, the connection will be stopped and callback error; When the set value is less than or equal to 0, it means no callback; if the set value is less than 3000 and greater than 0, it means the timeout is 3000ms. If the connection has been stopped before the connection times out, even if There is no error callback during the period when the device is not successfully connected.


unit
int
0 is kg, the default value1 is lb, lb, all scales can support this unit2 for jin, if the scale end does not support, it will display kg  3 is st, the stone, if the scale end does not support, it will display the value of lb,


showPowerAlertKey
bool
The default is false. When true, when the SDK is initialized and Bluetooth is off, the system will prompt you to indicate the Bluetooth status. For details, please refer to Apple Developer Documenttation => CoreBluetooth => CBCentralManager => Central Manager Initialization Options


setNotCheckGPS
bool
(Android exclusive) defaults to false. When true, the SDK will not perform GPS permission to judge when scanning, continue to perform scanning



unit
The unit displayed on the end, if not set, the default value of the SDK is kg. After the setting, the local will be saved. If there is already a connected device, the unit display of the scale end will be updated in real time.

The SDK will always return the value of kg. The APP needs to convert its own values.

attouched_list/faq.html.title: FAQ
attouched_list/faq.html.body:
common problem
How to judge the type of equipment
Currently, the device type is only Normal Bluetooth Scale and Bluetooth Broadcast Scale.
After calling Bluetooth scan, Normal Bluetooth device will return in onDeviceDiscover, Bluetooth broadcast scale will be called back in onBroadcastDeviceDiscover.

In addition, you can also easily judge by Bluetooth name. The body weight scale of Bluetooth named QN-Scale/QNScale1 is a common Bluetooth scale, and the Bluetooth name of QN-S3 is a Bluetooth broadcast scale.

appid and configuration file is what? What is the difference?
Appid is the unique identifier created by Light Cow for the customer. It will be registered in our background. A given appid will usually not change. The appid of 123456789 in the demo is the appid that we test and let the customer experience. The appid's features are unstable and may be modified at any time. If you have reached a formal cooperation intention, it is recommended that you apply for an appid for business or sales. The application process is very fast and can be completed in a few minutes.
The configuration file is some encrypted data used with the appid, and some information such as model, algorithm, and indicator are agreed upon. Different customer requirements will be different, so we package the customer customization requirements in this configuration file.
Can different clients use the same APPID?
Android and iOS can use an appid, applet/small plugin, and the appid of the SDK can't be used the same time.
Is the SDK offline? What data does it send to the Buffalo Cloud?
In the method initSdk, the SDK will send a request with our cloud check to see if the configuration file needs to be updated. If an update is required, the latest configuration file will be downloaded (the configuration file is small, typically 512 bytes), and if no updates are needed, no processing is done.
The SDK supports offline mode. If the customer rejects the request, we will set the configuration of the item in the configuration file to Offline. After being set to offline, the SDK will no longer send any network requests (this can be verified by the packet capture tool). The configuration file is no longer updated. If you need to add models or indicators, you need to apply for the configuration file again with our company, and then by the developer. Manual replacement.
Can I tell if the scale is off?
For 'normal Bluetooth scale' and 'dual mode scale', when the device is not connected, the device object QNBleDevice that is scanned is found to have an attribute isScreenOn, which indicates Whether the screen is bright. After connecting the device, it is not possible to directly judge whether the device is on the screen, but for some scales, the screen will be disconnected.
The >isScreenOn attribute simply indicates that the device is bright at the moment the SDK is scanned. The status of the subsequent device screen changes, and QNBleDevice does not update dynamically. Need to be judged by scanning the new QNBleDevice callback.
For the 'broadcast scale', it is possible to scan the device, that is, it has been turned on, and it cannot be scanned, usually it is not turned on.
Data missing indicator returned after measurement is completed
If it is only the weight and BMI data can refer to no data such as body fat percentage after the measurement is completed.
If you can measure the body fat rate, but you are missing the indicator you want, the situation is usually not included in the configuration file, you need to communicate with our business / sales, increase the indicator.
After we add the indicator, we will resend a configuration file and need to replace the configuration file.
Send the model id of the scanned device to our company for confirmation.
No data such as body fat percentage after measurement

Check whether the data is correct, mainly the two parameters of birthday (used to calculate age) and height, whether it is beyond the normal range.
Is there any shoe removal for measurement? When measuring shoes, bioimpedance cannot be measured, so it is impossible to calculate indicators such as body fat percentage.

Can't scan the device, how to deal with it

Check if Bluetooth is turned on, if there is a light scale, and if the phone is too far away from the scale (more than 10 meters)
Check if the scanned device is connected by someone else.
If it is Android, you can check if there is positioning permission, and if there is any open location service switch.
Try restarting Bluetooth, no longer, try restarting Bluetooth.

Is there a bracelet SDK?
Our company has a smart bracelet device and also has an SDK. However, the SDK is not completely open to the outside world. If you are interested, you can contact our business negotiation.
Can I give a calculation method for indicators such as body fat percentage?
The algorithm for these indicators belongs to my driver and cannot be provided.
Initialization prompt appid error

Check if the initialization file and the used appid match
Check if the imported SDK is up to date

The connection device has been unsuccessful or disconnected soon after success.

Check if the device is connected by someone else
Check if the currently connected device has been paired in the system Bluetooth, if you have already paired, you need to unpair
Some phones need to be scanned before they can connect successfully. Scan the device before connecting.

Data or device listening callbacks, callback multiple times at the same time

First determine if you have set up multiple monitors. Must be set to null when the listener is not in use
Determine if it is a shoe-wearing measurement, which may result in multiple measurements being completed in a short period of time

SDK returns no targeting permission error

Check if both ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION and ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION have been applied, and both permissions have been verified in the SDK.
Whether to compile version 26 and above, if yes, both permissions need to be applied separately (new features of 8.0)
Android 6.0 or above, Google classifies Bluetooth as part of the positioning function. When using Bluetooth scanning, the user needs to authorize the positioning permission. Otherwise, the system will prompt the positioning permission when calling the scanning.
A considerable number of mobile phones (about one-third of the way, when you do not open the location service switch, you can not scan the device, most of the original, and domestic systems will be optimized for this, not necessarily)



SDK returns the wrong file, confirms that there is no abnormality in the file location, and confirms that the file is used in the demo without exception.

Check if there is a so library added
Check if the packaged apk file contains a so library

What is the scale end storage data
When the ordinary Bluetooth scale is not connected to the mobile phone when weighing, the scale will store the data in the scale body. When the Bluetooth is connected next time, the data will be transmitted to the APP. Since the SDK cannot identify who the user is, it will put This data is assigned by the APP, and the assigned user can hand it over to the SDK to calculate the complete data.
Can I provide Bluetooth protocol?
In principle, we will not provide a Bluetooth protocol. If it is really needed, we can communicate with our business/sales.
Why do we use the data measured by the SDK to differ from the data of the light or runcobo health?
We have several algorithms, different algorithms that different devices may use.
In addition, we have a health problem mechanism in our own app that will allow users to answer 2 questions and use different algorithms depending on the user's response.
The algorithmic mechanism in the SDK is usually a unified algorithm that is immutable. That is to say, the same scale uses our APP measurement and uses the SDK to measure. The calculation data is the same as the weight, and there may be many differences. Therefore, our company does not recommend using the measurement data of our APP and SDK for comparison. Customers only need to care whether the given algorithm is suitable and stable.
After the Bluetooth version is abnormal in the online version, how to troubleshoot the problem
First check the user's mobile phone model, if possible, try to use the same model as the customer to test.
Register the log output interface QNLogListener, record the relevant logs (can save the log file), and send it to our developers for analysis.
SDK can only do protocol parsing, Bluetooth scanning and connection are managed by the customer
This is achievable, and the implementation of the normal Bluetooth scale and the Bluetooth broadcast scale will be different.

Self-implementation of Bluetooth scanning and connection management, there are certain technical difficulties, if there is no relevant Bluetooth development experience, it is not recommended to do this.

Normal Bluetooth Scale

Write your own Bluetooth Protocol Proxy Class to implement various Bluetooth operation methods.
Write the Data Listening Callback Class QNScaleDataListener and register it to the SDK using [QNBleApi.setBleDeviceDiscoveryListener.
Perform a Bluetooth scan yourself and pass the scanned information to the SDK. Use the method QNBleApi.buildDevice to create a light blue Bluetooth device object.
Create a user object using the method QNBleApi.buildUser
Create Bluetooth Protocol Processing Class
Make a Bluetooth connection
After the connection is successful, after discovering that the service is successful, call the default method of the Bluetooth protocol processing class
Process the data of QNScaleDataListener callback
Collect the stable data and handle it yourself.

Bluetooth Broadcasting Scale
When will the Bluetooth of the body fat scale be turned on, and how long will it automatically turn off the Bluetooth (or disconnect the phone)?
Normally, the body fat scale Bluetooth will turn on when the scale is on (that is, when the screen is lit), and the broadcast will be broadcast. After the measurement is finished, the scale will meet the screen, and the screen will generally continue to connect for 1-2 minutes (depending on the production batch), and then actively disconnect the measurement. This mechanism is for the user to lift the scale again in a short time without having to connect again. If the APP needs to be disconnected immediately after measurement, it can be actively disconnected after a delay of more than 1 s after receiving stable data.
The status of the Scale Status Definition of your official website API is 0-9. Why is there a status of "-1" in the Demo you provided (and it really returns to this state)
-1 always exists, indicating that the default state is lost, that is, the connection is disconnected. Usually received after the scale is actively disconnected. We will unify this state to the disconnected state as soon as possible.
After searching for Bluetooth and connecting it, the foot stays on the body fat scale for a few seconds, then removes the foot and returns the status code of the measurement completion (there is no data returned in the method of returning data)
Why can we search for Bluetooth without any operation (no one is close to the body fat scale within 10-30 minutes)
When weighing, if the APP is connected, the scale will cache this data into it, and the broadcast will also be broadcast for 5-30 minutes (depending on the production batch). After the APP is connected, the cached data can be received and displayed to the client. This function is used to solve the problem. When the user weighs, the mobile phone is not used. After the weighing is finished, sit on the sofa and open the mobile phone and receive the data.
